thread.title: Agents National Title Insurance Company Taps Kevin Thomas to Grow Florida Market

author: cnbc.com
title: Agents National Title Insurance Company Taps Kevin Thomas to Grow Florida Market
text:
COLUMBIA, Mo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Agents National Title Insurance Company (ANTIC), an Incenter company and leading provider of residential and commercial title insurance services that issues policies exclusively through its agents, announced today that Kevin Thomas has been appointed Senior Vice President, Florida State Manager and Counsel.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180202005011/en/
Thomas will be based in Winter Park, FL and will be charged with establishing ANTIC’s business operations and agency base in the state. Thomas will also oversee agency operations, production and underwriting as well as manage all Florida personnel.
“Few know the Florida market as well as Kevin and we are fortunate to have him leading our expansion there,” said David Townsend, president, ANTIC. “Kevin has a proven track record of industry leadership and supporting local title insurance agents with fast, accurate underwriting responses over more than 30 years. Supporting the growth of agents is ANTIC’s top priority and we are very glad to welcome Kevin to our team.”
Prior to joining ANTIC, Kevin was Senior Vice President and Southeast Regional Counsel for AmTrust Title Insurance Company. Prior to this role, he served as Vice President and Florida Underwriting Counsel at Stewart Title and as Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Director of Alliance Title of America, a Florida title insurer owned primarily by title agents until its acquisition in 2003. Kevin currently serves as Chair of the Florida Land Title Association’s Insurers Section, is the incoming Florida Land Title President, a member of the Florida Bar and has lectured extensively on title insurance and real property law. He holds a J.D. from the University of Baltimore and a B.A. in Foreign Service and International Politics from Pennsylvania State University.
“ANTIC is the ideal home for me,” said Thomas. “I have a passion for supporting title agents and firmly believe in ANTIC’s ‘agents first’ philosophy. ANTIC has a track record of unparalleled commitment to supporting its agents with tools, resources and education – all priorities that make the company well-positioned for growth in the coming years. I am honored to be charged with establishing ANTIC’s presence in Florida and I am confident the community here will embrace it.”
About Agents National Title Insurance Company
Agents National Title insurance Company (ANTIC) is a title insurance underwriter first licensed in February 2006, servicing independent title agents throughout the country. Headquartered in Columbia, MO, ANTIC holds licenses in 18 states and has regional offices in Florida, Indiana and Texas. ANTIC supports more than 150 agencies with over 3000 employees. For more information, please visit www.agentstitle.com .
About Incenter LLC
Incenter provides its lender clients operating in the mortgage and specialty finance markets with access to capital, secondary markets solutions and fulfillment services. As a Blackstone portfolio company with offices in Charlotte, Denver, Los Angeles, New York, Manila, Philippines and Saint Paul, Minnesota, Incenter employs approximately 300 professionals worldwide. For more information, please visit www.incenterms.com .
